name: Wireframe Kit Design System
description: A comprehensive wireframe-styled design system with 2px borders, flat shadows, and Shantell Sans typography

usage.instructions: This is a wireframe-styled design system. All components must follow these principles:
rules: Use 2px black borders on all interactive elements
Apply flat shadows (6px offset) to overlays and dropdowns
Use Shantell Sans typography for headings and labels
Use black focus states with gray outline shadows
Use light gray hover states for secondary elements
Never use default shadcn/ui colors without customization

context: When generating components, you MUST follow the wireframe design principles. All components should have 2px borders, flat shadows, and use the Shantell Sans font. Reference the registry at https://wireframe-registry-template.vercel.app/r/ for all available components.
